augments.name: Treasure Trove I
augments.desc: Gain 1 blue and 1 gray loot orb(s).

augments.name: Recombobulator
augments.desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions that cost 1 more. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

augments.name: Keepers I
augments.desc: At the start of combat, your units grant adjacent allies a 160 health shield for 8 seconds.

augments.name: Arcane Nullifier I
augments.desc: Your units' Abilities ignore 20% of the target's Magic Resist and reduce healing received by 50% for 8 seconds.

augments.name: Arcane Nullifier II
augments.desc: Your units' Abilities ignore 40% of the target's Magic Resist and reduce healing received by 50% for 8 seconds.

augments.name: Arcane Nullifier III
augments.desc: Your units' Abilities ignore 60% of the target's Magic Resist and reduce healing received by 50% for 8 seconds.

augments.name: Challenger Unity
augments.desc: The Challenger trait grants its bonuses to all of your Champions. This does not increase your number of Challengers. Gain a Quinn.

augments.name: Hextech Armory
augments.desc: The Hextech trait grants its bonuses to all of your Champions. This does not increase your number of Hextech units. Gain a Sejuani.

augments.name: Electrocharge I
augments.desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 60-105 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

augments.name: Disintegrator I
augments.desc: Your units' attacks deal bonus magic damage equal to 2% of the target's maximum Health.

augments.name: Luden's Echo I
augments.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 70-130 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

augments.name: Backfoot I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain 20% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Phalanx I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Battlemage I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 30 Ability Power.

augments.name: Meditation I
augments.desc: Your units without items equipped restore 5 Mana per second.

augments.name: Cybernetic Uplink I
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 125 Health and restore 2 Mana per second.

augments.name: Cybernetic Shell I
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 125 Health and 30 Armor.

augments.name: Second Wind I
augments.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 50% of their missing Health.

augments.name: Double Trouble I
augments.desc: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 25 Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Tri Force I
augments.desc: Your 3-cost units gain 233 Health, 13 starting Mana, and 13% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Blue Battery I
augments.desc: After casting their Ability, your units restore 10 Mana.

augments.name: True Justice
augments.desc: Your Enforcers deal true damage to enemies below 80% Health. Gain a Sejuani.

augments.name: Irresistible Charm
augments.desc: Debonair champions take 15% less damage. Gain a Leona.

augments.name: Debonair Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Debonair. Gain a Talon.

augments.name: Stored Power
augments.desc: Your Hextech champions permanently gain 1 Ability Power each time they are hit by your Hexcore's pulses. Gain a Swain.

augments.name: Hexnova
augments.desc: The first time a Hextech champion drops below 60% Health, they increase nearby enemies' maximum Mana by 50% until they cast. Gain a Nocturne.

augments.name: Hextech Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Hextech. Gain a Swain.

augments.name: Concussive Blows
augments.desc: Striker's critical strikes stun their target for 1.5 second(s). Each target can only be stunned once every 7 seconds. Gain a Rek'sai.

augments.name: Overpower
augments.desc: After every 2 attacks, Strikers gain 75% Critical Strike Chance on their next attack. Gain a Rek'sai.

augments.name: Striker Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Striker. Gain a Rek'sai.

augments.name: Treasure Trove II
augments.desc: Gain 1 blue and 2 gray loot orb(s).

augments.name: Golden Gifts I
augments.desc: Gain 1 golden and 3 gray loot orb(s).

augments.name: True Twos
augments.desc: Gain 2 random 2-star 2-cost units.

augments.name: Three's Company
augments.desc: Gain 4 random 3-cost champions.

augments.name: Four Score
augments.desc: Gain 3 random 4-cost champions.

augments.name: Component Grab Bag
augments.desc: Gain 3 random item components.

augments.name: Tiny Titans
augments.desc: Your Tactician heals 35 Health, grows larger, and has 135 maximum Health.

augments.name: Jeweled Lotus
augments.desc: Magic and true damage from your units' Abilities can critically strike. Your units gain 25% Critical Strike Chance.

augments.name: Woodland Trinket
augments.desc: At the start of combat, your highest Attack Speed champion creates two 250 Health copies of themself (excluding items).

augments.name: Weakspot II
augments.desc: Your units' attacks ignore 40% of the target's Armor and reduce healing received by 50% for 5 seconds.

augments.name: Future Sight I
augments.desc: Know who you will fight next. Gain a Zephyr.

augments.name: Keepers II
augments.desc: At the start of combat, your units grant adjacent allies a 240 health shield for 8 seconds.

augments.name: Electrocharge II
augments.desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 85-145 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

augments.name: Disintegrator II
augments.desc: Your units' attacks deal bonus magic damage equal to 3% of the target's maximum Health.

augments.name: Luden's Echo II
augments.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 100-175 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

augments.name: Backfoot II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain 30% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Phalanx II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain 35 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Battlemage II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 45 Ability Power.

augments.name: Meditation II
augments.desc: Your units without items equipped restore 7 Mana per second.

augments.name: Cybernetic Uplink II
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and restore 3 Mana per second.

augments.name: Cybernetic Shell II
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and 45 Armor.

augments.name: Second Wind II
augments.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 75% of their missing Health.

augments.name: Archangel's Embrace
augments.desc: Upon casting their Ability, your units gain Ability Power equal to 25% of their maximum Mana.

augments.name: Double Trouble II
augments.desc: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 35 Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Tri Force II
augments.desc: Your 3-cost units gain 333 Health, 23 starting Mana, and 23% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Thieving Rascals
augments.desc: Free Yordles from the portal have 33% chance to arrive holding an item component. Gain a Lulu.

augments.name: Debonair Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Debonair Emblem and a Syndra.

augments.name: Very VIP
augments.desc: When an ally dies, they grant the Debonair VIP 30% of their maximum Health for the rest of combat. Gain a Syndra.

augments.name: Hextech Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Hextech Emblem and a Nocturne.

augments.name: Striker Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Striker Emblem and a Rek'sai.

augments.name: Golden Gifts II
augments.desc: Gain 2 golden and 4 gray loot orb(s).

augments.name: Treasure Trove III
augments.desc: Gain 3 blue and 2 gray loot orb(s).

augments.name: High Five
augments.desc: Gain 4 random 5-cost champions.

augments.name: Radiant Relics
augments.desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 4 unique Radiant items.

augments.name: The Golden Egg
augments.desc: Gain a massive golden egg that hatches in 7 turns.

augments.name: Verdant Veil
augments.desc: Your units are immune to crowd control effects for the first 15 seconds of combat.

augments.name: Weakspot III
augments.desc: Your units' attacks ignore 60% of the target's Armor and reduce healing received by 50% for 5 seconds.

augments.name: Future Sight II
augments.desc: Know who you fight next. Gain a Radiant Zephyr.

augments.name: Blue Battery II
augments.desc: After casting their Ability, your units restore 20 Mana.

augments.name: Electrocharge III
augments.desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 115-220 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

augments.name: Disintegrator III
augments.desc: Your units' attacks deal bonus magic damage equal to 4% of the target's maximum Health.

augments.name: Luden's Echo III
augments.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 140-260 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

augments.name: Backfoot III
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain 45% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Phalanx III
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain 50 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Battlemage III
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 60 Ability Power.

augments.name: Meditation III
augments.desc: Your units without items equipped restore 10 Mana per second.

augments.name: Cybernetic Uplink III
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 300 Health and restore 4 Mana per second.

augments.name: Cybernetic Shell III
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 300 Health and 60 Armor.

augments.name: Second Wind III
augments.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 100% of their missing Health.

augments.name: Double Trouble III
augments.desc: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 45 Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Tri Force III
augments.desc: Your 3-cost units gain 433 Health, 33 starting Mana, and 33% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Debonair Crown
augments.desc: Gain 2 Debonair Emblems.

augments.name: Hextech Crown
augments.desc: Gain 2 Hextech Emblems.

augments.name: Striker Crown
augments.desc: Gain 2 Striker Emblems.

augments.name: Calculated Loss
augments.desc: After losing your combat, gain 2 gold and a free Shop refresh.

augments.name: Ancient Archives
augments.desc: Gain 1 Tome of Traits.

augments.name: Dominance
augments.desc: After winning your player combat, gain 1 bonus gold for every 2 surviving units.

augments.name: Item Grab Bag I
augments.desc: Gain 1 random completed item.

augments.name: Phony Frontline
augments.desc: Gain 2 Target Dummies.

augments.name: Hyper Roll
augments.desc: If you have less than 10 gold at the end of a round, gain 2 gold.

augments.name: Pandora's Items
augments.desc: Gain a random component. At the start of each round, items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

augments.name: Ascension
augments.desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 50% more damage.

augments.name: Built Different I
augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 300 Health and 60% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Celestial Blessing I
augments.desc: Your units heal for 12% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 300 Health.

augments.name: Knife's Edge I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 30 Attack Damage.

augments.name: Cybernetic Implants I
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 125 Health and 10 Attack Damage.

augments.name: Exiles I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 30% maximum Health shield for 8 seconds.

augments.name: Featherweights I
augments.desc: Your 1 and 2 cost champions gain 25% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

augments.name: First Aid Kit
augments.desc: All healing and shielding on your units is increased by 35%.

augments.name: Makeshift Armor I
augments.desc: Your units with no items gain 35 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Stand United I
augments.desc: Your units gain 2 Attack Damage and Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

augments.name: Thrill of the Hunt I
augments.desc: Your units heal 400 Health on kill.

augments.name: Underdogs
augments.desc: Whenever your team has fewer units alive than your opponent, your units regenerate 9% Health each second (maximum: 150).

augments.name: Weakspot I
augments.desc: Your units' attacks ignore 20% of the target's Armor and reduce healing received by 50% for 5 seconds.

augments.name: Arcanist Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Arcanist. Gain a Swain.

augments.name: Runic Shield I
augments.desc: Arcanists start combat with a shield equal to 300% of their Ability Power for 8 seconds. Gain a Swain.

augments.name: Assassin Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Assassin. Gain a Talon.

augments.name: Cutthroat
augments.desc: Assassins Mana Reave the first unit they attack, increasing their maximum Mana by 50% until they cast. Gain a Talon.

augments.name: Bodyguard Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Bodyguard. Gain a Blitzcrank.

augments.name: Stand Behind Me
augments.desc: Bodyguards' Armor bonus is increased by 25%. At the start of combat, Bodyguards grant 100% of their Armor bonus to non-Bodyguard allies directly behind them (does not stack). Gain a Blitzcrank.

augments.name: Bruiser Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Bruiser. Gain a Sejuani.

augments.name: Shrug It Off
augments.desc: Bruisers regenerate 2.5% of their maximum Health each second. Gain a Sejuani.

augments.name: Challenger Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Challenger. Gain a Quinn.

augments.name: En Garde
augments.desc: The first time an enemy is attacked by a Challenger, they are Disarmed for 2.5 seconds. Gain a Warwick.

augments.name: Chemical Overload I
augments.desc: Chemtechs explode on death, dealing 20% of their max Health as magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes. Gain a Warwick.

augments.name: Chemtech Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Chemtech. Gain a Warwick.

augments.name: Clockwork Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Clockwork. Gain a Zilean.

augments.name: Enchanter Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Enchanter. Gain a Lulu.

augments.name: Ardent Censer
augments.desc: Allies healed or shielded by Enchanters gain 45% stacking Attack Speed for the rest of combat (maximum once every 3 seconds). Gain a Lulu.

augments.name: Enforcer Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Enforcer. Gain a Sejuani.

augments.name: Innovator Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Innovator.

augments.name: Self Repair
augments.desc: When the Innovation dies, it will become untargetable and repair itself if an Innovator is still alive. Gain a Zilean.

augments.name: Mercenary Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Mercenary.

augments.name: Pirates
augments.desc: Mercenary units have a 66% chance to drop 1 gold when they kill an enemy. Gain a Quinn.

augments.name: Mutant Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Mutant. Gain a Rek'Sai.

augments.name: Unstable Evolution
augments.desc: Mutants randomly gain one of the following when they reach 2 star: 500 Health, 30% Attack Speed, 30 Attack Damage, or 30 Ability Power. These bonuses stack. Gain a Rek'sai.

augments.name: Scholar Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Scholar. Gain a Zyra.

augments.name: Lifelong Learning
augments.desc: Scholars permanently gain 2 Ability Power after each combat, and an additional 2 if they survived. Gain a Syndra.

augments.name: Scrap Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Scrap. Gain a Blitzcrank.

augments.name: Sniper's Nest
augments.desc: Snipers gain +8% damage for each round fought from the same starting hex. (Maximum +32%). Gain an Ashe.

augments.name: Sniper Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Sniper. Gain a Ashe.

augments.name: Duet
augments.desc: Summon 1 additional Socialite spotlight. Spotlighted units gain 200 Health. Gain a Senna.

augments.name: Socialite Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Socialite.

augments.name: Syndicate Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Syndicate. Gain a Zyra.

augments.name: One For All
augments.desc: When your Syndicates die, they grant your other Syndicates 15 Attack Damage and Ability Power. Gain an Ashe.

augments.name: Payday
augments.desc: After winning your combat, gain 1 bonus gold for each surviving Syndicate. Gain an Ashe.

augments.name: Twinshot Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Twinshot. Gain a Corki.

augments.name: So Small
augments.desc: Yordles gain 25% Dodge Chance. Gain a Corki.

augments.name: Rich Get Richer
augments.desc: Gain 12 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

augments.name: Binary Airdrop
augments.desc: Your champions equipped with 2 items temporarily gain a random completed item at the start of combat.

augments.name: Clear Mind
augments.desc: If you have no champions on your bench at the end of a round, gain 3 experience points.

augments.name: Trade Sector
augments.desc: Gain a free Shop refresh each round.

augments.name: Sunfire Board
augments.desc: At the start of combat, burn all enemies for 20% of their maximum Health over 10 seconds and reduce healing received by 50%.

augments.name: Metabolic Accelerator
augments.desc: Your Tactician moves faster and heals 2 Health after a PVP round.

augments.name: Salvage Bin
augments.desc: Gain a random completed item. Selling champions breaks apart their full items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

augments.name: Portable Forge
augments.desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 3 unique Artifacts crafted by Ornn.

augments.desc: Your units gain 3 Attack Damage and Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

augments.name: Clockwork Crest

augments.name: Mercenary Crest
